roles.name: team_leader
roles.description: Team Leader with task management permissions

tasks.title: Client Meeting - ABC Corp
tasks.description: Conduct quarterly business review meeting with ABC Corp to discuss project progress and future requirements.

location.address: ABC Corp Office, World Trade Center, Colombo 01

tasks.title: Database Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize database queries and implement indexing to improve system performance by at least 30%.

location.address: Head Office - IT Department, Galle Road, Colombo 03

tasks.title: Mobile App Testing - iOS
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of the new mobile application on various iOS devices. Test all features and create bug reports.

tasks.title: Site Inspection - Kandy Branch
tasks.description: Conduct monthly site inspection at Kandy branch office. Check security systems, IT infrastructure, and facilities.

location.address: Kandy Branch Office, Temple Street, Kandy

tasks.title: Security Audit Report
tasks.description: Prepare comprehensive security audit report based on recent penetration testing and vulnerability assessments.

tasks.title: Equipment Maintenance - Galle
tasks.description: Perform scheduled maintenance on server equipment and network infrastructure at Galle office.

location.address: Galle Branch Office, Fort Area, Galle

tasks.title: Staff Training - Cybersecurity
tasks.description: Conduct mandatory cybersecurity awareness training for all staff members. Cover phishing, password security, and data protection.

tasks.title: Network Upgrade - Negombo
tasks.description: Upgrade network infrastructure at Negombo office. Install new switches and configure firewall settings.

location.address: Negombo Branch Office, Main Street, Negombo
